com.shaneahern.puzzle
Class PuzzleActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.shaneahern.puzzle.PuzzleActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
PuzzleMoveListener
public class PuzzleActivity
extends Activity
implements PuzzleMoveListener

Main activity for puzzle. Implements listeners for the sensor module (to detect device "shake" action), on touch and on click listeners for user input and a app specific listener for puzzle moves.

Author:
Shane Ahern (shane@shaneahern.com)
